page.title: 17Transport from Buckley
page.content: 109 men and 47 women travel by car,5 men travel to work on motor cycles, 1 man and 3 women cycle to work ,2 men and 14 women walk to work Public transport is not much used. 2 men and 5 women go to work by bus, one man and one woman travel to work by rail one woman goes to work by taxi 3 men who work abroad travel by plane. Of those who work outside the Buckley area,47 men and 31 women are employed elsewhere in Clwyd.41 men and 11 women travel over the the county border into Cheshire,while 17 men and 5 women travel further afield to work.
